transArray.content: The environment is pretty good, mainly because it is relatively close to where I want to go.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. This location provides guests with great convenience in terms of food, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. Moreover, the hotel's enthusiastic staff will escort you during your trip. We With "the happy mood of the family" as our top priority, we touch everyone with the most considerate warmth. All the staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
